languages.text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость. Его допрашивали еще до вашего распоряжения. Ответственность за то, что не предугадал ваш приказ, беру на себя".
"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость. Его допрашивали еще до вашего распоряжения. Ответственность за то, что не предугадал ваш приказ, беру на себя".

traits.locale_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
"My humblest apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The preparations for this interrogation were made before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating your will."
"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
"My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."

languages.text: «Discúlpeme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Este fue interrogado antes de que tuviésemos constancia de su orden. Asumo toda la responsabilidad por no haberlo previsto».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."

traits.locale_text: «Discúlpeme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Este fue interrogado antes de que tuviésemos constancia de su orden. Asumo toda la responsabilidad por no haberlo previsto».

languages.text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。この者は、あなたの命令が下される前に尋問を受けていました。この責任は私が取ります」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ございません、陛下。この者は、あなたの命令が下される前に尋問を受けていました。この責任は私が取ります」

languages.text: “非常抱歉，大人。在您下达命令之前，这个人就已经遭到了审讯。我未能预见到这一点，我愿意为此承担责任。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."

traits.locale_text: “非常抱歉，大人。在您下达命令之前，这个人就已经遭到了审讯。我未能预见到这一点，我愿意为此承担责任。”

languages.text: "Verzeiht mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Er hier wurde vor der Erteilung Eures Befehls verhört. Ich übernehme die Verantwortung, ihn nicht vorhergesehen zu haben."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Er hier wurde vor der Erteilung Eures Befehls verhört. Ich übernehme die Verantwortung, ihn nicht vorhergesehen zu haben."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Celui-ci a été interrogé avant que vos instructions nous parviennent. J'assume l'entière responsabilité de ce manque d'anticipation. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie. Celui-ci a été interrogé avant que vos instructions nous parviennent. J'assume l'entière responsabilité de ce manque d'anticipation. »

languages.text: "Özürlerimi sunarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bunu emir verilmeden önce sorgulamıştık. Emri öngöremediğimiz için tüm sorumluluğu üstleniyorum."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This one was interrogated before your order was given. I will take responsibility for not anticipating it."
